CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper August 25, 1950, pg. 12, reads: "Hobbytown Circus at IKS - Marking the end of the summer playground program at Irene Kaufmann Settlement last Thursday, these children played the part of gayly bedecked ponies in one of the animal acts. In addition there was a side show, a wild west show and dances by members of the Irene Kaufmann Settlement Dancing School. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Small crowd watching children wearing paper pony hats parading in circle during Hobbytown Circus at Irene Kaufmann Settlement, Hill District
